title: HMCL启动失败（附图）大神帮忙解决！！！
author: Reverseday

replies.author: 专sha苦力怕
replies.txt_content:
联网了没
联了还不行就在设置里“下载源”换成“BMCLAPI”

replies.author: Reverseday
replies.txt_content: [11:09:53] [org.jackhuang.hmcl.task.TaskExecutor.executeTask/FINE] Task failed: scala-reflect-2.11.1.jar java.io.IOException: Server error, response code: 301         at org.jackhuang.hmcl.task.FileDownloadTask.execute(FileDownloadTask.java:148)         at org.jackhuang.hmcl.task.TaskExecutor.executeTask(TaskExecutor.java:166)         at org.jackhuang.hmcl.task.TaskExecutor.access$000(TaskExecutor.java:35)         at org.jackhuang.hmcl.task.TaskExecutor$Invoker.run(TaskExecutor.java:226)         at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.ExceptionalRunnable.lambda$toCallable$0(ExceptionalRunnable.java:32)         at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source)         at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)         at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)         at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

replies.author: aqwyh
replies.txt_content: 把启动器设置里的下载源改成另一个试试
